categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Priestess was a female Northern Mustafarian who lived on the planet Mustafar. At some point during the Imperial Era, the priestess told a smuggler who was a descendant of Lady Corvax, the importance of the Bright Star and how Mustafar had became a volcanic wasteland.
The Priestess first appeared in the first chapter of Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series, a three-part virtual reality series created by ILMxLAB. She was voiced by Folake Olowofoyeku.
